headline.title: Create QR code for event check-in

section-main.intro: The app now allows a check-in for events and locations. People who host events or have a business can now create a QR code. By scanning the QR code, guests can check in upon arrival to register their presence. If desired, the app will also create a corresponding diary entry. If a checked-in person later tests positive for the coronavirus, other people who were checked in at the same time can be warned.
section-main.disclaimer: All information is processed only locally in your browser. Neither the QR codes you generate nor the information they contain are sent to the Corona-Warn-App servers. The source code of the generator is freely available for viewing.
